name: Last Station
description:
**Headphones recommended**

You get on the train after a long day, and you can't help but doze off.
You wake up after your regular stop, to an eerily quiet station, and no one seems to be around.
Its dark, and you've only got your phone flashlight. 
What the hell is out there?

Created during Art & Interaction course at Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, guided by Dani Bacon and Rutu Modan.
